elements.title: Balkan terrapins (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that hatchling Balkan terrapins are only 3 to 4 centimetres (1.2 to 1.6 in) in length, while adults (example pictured) can grow as long as 25 cm (9.8 in)?

elements.title: Rush Munro's (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Rush Munro's, New Zealand's oldest ice creamery, has used the same recipes since 1926?

elements.title: Newlyn Tidal Observatory (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the mean sea level observed by the Newlyn Tidal Observatory from 1915 to 1921 defined the reference for height measurement in Great Britain?

elements.title: Orchard MRT station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Orchard MRT station had a dome over the station's circular concourse until it was removed in 2008?

elements.title: Boloco (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that there are only 4 locations left of Boloco, which once had 22 burrito restaurants throughout the northeastern United States?

elements.title: Jeʹvida (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jeʹvida is the first feature film in the Skolt Sámi language?

elements.title: Minor Detail (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the novel Minor Detail is based on a true story of a 1949 gang rape and murder of a young Arab Bedouin-Palestinian girl by Israeli soldiers?

elements.title: You've Been Scammed (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that people were scammed on New Zealand television by the host of You've Been Scammed?
